starvationevasion.client.GUI.DraftLayout.map

Class ConfigPhaseMapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.GUI.DraftLayout.map.MapController
      • starvationevasion.client.GUI.DraftLayout.map.ConfigPhaseMapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapConstants

    public class ConfigPhaseMapController
extends MapController
    Controls the behavior of the US Map when the game is in the configuration phase (AKA Region selection)
